SEARCH
Package com.mjh.innaxyswebapp.service

Class EdgeService

java.lang.Object
com.mjh.innaxyswebapp.service.EdgeService
@Service public class EdgeService extends Object
Class which allows for access to various methods which will alter the data within the 'edges' table of the database. CRUD principles are found here and can be used to add edges to the 'edges' table, as well as retrieval, deletion, and updating. The EdgeRepository can be reviewed to find further queries necessary.
Since:
02-10-2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
MaxMJH - MaxHarrisMJH@gmail.com

      Returns:

    • getAllEdges

      public List<Edge> getAllEdges()
      Method used to get all edges from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all edges within the edges table.

    • getEdgeById

      public Optional<Edge> getEdgeById(Long id)
      Method used to get an edge specified by a primary key (ID of the edge).
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the edge.
      Returns:
      An Optional if the edge exists, or an empty Optional otherwise.

    • getEdgeBySource

      public List<Edge> getEdgeBySource(String name)
      Method used to get all edges specified by the name of a source node.
      Parameters:
      name - The source name of the node.
      Returns:
      A List if the edge exists, or null otherwise.

    • getEdgeBySourceAndTarget

      target - The target name of the node.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      source - The source name of the node.
      Returns:
      A Optional if the edge exists, or an empty Optional otherwise.

    • updateEdge

      public Edge updateEdge(Long id, Edge edge)
      Method used to update an existing edge within the database - note that the edge's primary key must also be passed.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the edge to update.
      edge - The edge which contains the new data.
      Returns:
      The updated edge, or null if update failed.

    • updateEdge

      Parameters:
      existingEdge - The edge to update.
      newEdge - The edge which contains the new data.
      Returns:
      The updated edge, or null if update failed.
